title: Stopwatch Iteration 1
text:
from textual.app import App, ComposeResult
from textual.widgets import Header, Footer
App is a baseclass. Footer shows a bar at the bottom of the screen that contains keyboard shortcuts. Header will show the title at the top of the screen.

title: Stopwatch Iteration 1
text:
Create the App Class

source

StopwatchApp

 StopwatchApp (driver_class:Type[Driver]|None=None,
               css_path:CSSPathType=None, watch_css:bool=False)

A Textual app to manage stopwatches.
This class contains a BINDINGS tuple. The first value is the key, the second is the name of the action, and the third is a short description.

source


StopwatchApp.compose

 StopwatchApp.compose ()

Create child widgets for the app.
This method creates the user interface with widgets. It’s easier to yield them than to return them.

source


StopwatchApp.action_toggle_dark

 StopwatchApp.action_toggle_dark ()

An action to toggle dark mode.
This is an action method. Such methods begin with the action_ prefix. The BINDINGS tuple tells Textual to run this action when D is pressed.

title: Stopwatch Iteration 2
text:
from textual.app import App, ComposeResult
from textual.containers import Container
from textual.widgets import Button, Header, Footer, Static
Button creates a clickable button. Static is a base class for simple control. Container is a Widget that contains other widgets.

title: Stopwatch Iteration 2
text:
Create Time Display

source

TimeDisplay

 TimeDisplay (renderable:RenderableType='', expand:bool=False,
              shrink:bool=False, markup:bool=True, name:str|None=None,
              id:str|None=None, classes:str|None=None)

A widget to display elapsed time.
This class will be fleshed out later.

title: Stopwatch Iteration 5
text:
source



 TimeDisplay (renderable:RenderableType='', expand:bool=False,
              shrink:bool=False, markup:bool=True, name:str|None=None,
              id:str|None=None, classes:str|None=None)

A widget to display elapsed time.
The arguments passed to reactive specify the default value or a callable that returns the default

source




 TimeDisplay.on_mount ()

Event handler called when widget is added to the app.

source




 TimeDisplay.update_time ()

Method to update the time to the current time.

source




 TimeDisplay.watch_time (time:float)

Called when the time attribute changes.
A method prefixed with watch_ and suffixed with the name of a reactive attribute is called every time the reactive attribute is modified.
